thread.title_full: Lady Gaga Getting Ready for Super Bowl 51 Halftime Show - Lady Gaga at the Super Bowl

author: Lauren Alexis Fisher
title: Lady Gaga Getting Ready for Super Bowl 51 Halftime Show - Lady Gaga at the Super Bowl
text:
Ahead of her big halftime show performance tonight at Super Bowl LI, Lady Gaga is already slaying well before kickoff. If you had any doubt that the singer was going to give us her very best Gaga tonight, she's already proved otherwise with a game-day warmup that came to slay. From sporting a custom pink "Gaga" helmet and jersey to hitting the football field in high heels, she's been documenting each moment of her prep today on Instagram and Twitter.
 First, she gave us her best pre-show dance warmup sans pants (hair fan included, of course):
Gettin' too funky in the dressing room. While my best friends side eye me from the couch for bein a ham ğŸ˜‚ so happy my friends and family are. Let's go men it's gametime!ğŸˆğŸˆğŸˆğŸˆğŸ¤âš¡ï¸
A video posted by xoxo, Joanne (@ladygaga) on Feb 5, 2017 at 2:03pm PST
